conclusion: Determine if the puppy is safe by calculating the total distance the bus travels before stopping.
Reaction time is 0.5 seconds, and the bus travels at 20 m/s during this time.
Distance traveled during reaction time is 10 m.
Velocity-time graph shows the bus stops after 4.5 seconds from the start of braking.
Initial velocity is 20 m/s, final velocity is 0 m/s, and time for deceleration is 4 seconds.
Distance traveled during deceleration is 40 m.
Total distance traveled by the bus is 50 m.
Initial distance to the puppy is 45 m.
Since 50 m > 45 m, the bus would travel past the puppy's position.
The puppy is not safe as the bus will travel 50 meters before stopping.
